snippet: Stacy S. Kim and Kyle Okimoto and their two daughters had outgrown their one-bedroom so they went searching for an actual two-bedroom.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Stacy S Kim and Kyle Okimoto for two-bedroom apartment in Manhattan; found co-op at Lincoln Towers on West End Avenue for $980,000.
lead_paragraph: Stacy S. Kim and Kyle Okimoto and their two daughters had outgrown their one-bedroom so they went searching for an actual two-bedroom.

headline.print_headline: Folding Up the Murphy Bed for Good
